title: Customized Mobile Microlearning Course for Gen Z Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Nursing Knowledge and Relevant Work Experience
context.additional_context: A customized curriculum for workers in their 40s and above, reflecting the characteristics of Gen Z nursing learners and the educational needs of digital-native generations.

learning_goals: Design educational content that reflects Gen Z learners' preference for digital environments
Develop an effective nursing education process utilizing mobile-based microlearning strategies
Apply customized teaching methods considering generational trait differences to improve educational satisfaction by 15%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
